name: J & K Electronics
overview:
As an authorized service center for most manufacturers, you can have confidence that J & K Electronics can expertly service your HDTV, LCD TV, Plasma TV, laptop computer, PC and other valuable electronics. J & K Electronics has two locations in Houston to serve you. We can also have one of our specially-trained technicians come to your home or office.

TV Repair - What makes J and K electronics stand out from other Houston TV repair companies? It is simple, all of our TV repair technicians are factory authorized and trained by each TV manufacturer. The technicians at J and K Electronics know all about new televisions and products before they even hit store shelves giving us the expertise on TVs right from the start.

Computer Repair - J and K Electronics is your answer to laptop and pc computer repair services with specialists to help you get back up and running. The laptop computer has become so abundant in the on-the-go lifestyles of people today. However, repairing a laptop can prove to be very difficult. Let the properly trained and certified technician’s at J and K Electronics be your first stop for laptop repairs.

Having trouble with your home or office computer? Having problems with your server or network? Our lead computer repair technician is a Dell, IBM and Microsoft partner and is a network specialist.

Let J & K Electronics provide all your small business solutions. We can build computers and servers from the ground up per your specifications and we can also provide VPN connections.
